        Parameters:
        device - A JSONObject representing the device
        Returns:
        True if the request is received by router

      • updateDeviceInfo

        public boolean updateDeviceInfo(org.json.JSONObject device)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Update informations about a connected device. Device informations are passed as a JSONObject and must contain
        • IP: String
        • MAC: String
        • QOS: int
        • PARENTAL: boolean
        • DISCONNECT: boolean
        Parameters:
        device - The JSONObject representing the device info
        Returns:
        True if the request is received by router
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • editAddressReservation

        public void editAddressReservation(org.json.JSONObject dhcpEntry)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Edit the DHCP entry. Must contain:
        • ID: unique identified for this entry as released by the AirStation
        • IP: String
        • MAC: String
        Parameters:
        dhcpEntry - The entry to edit
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
